website_summaries.verdict: A speedier interface and 4K capability are hallmarks of this mid-range DVR, but it may not be as good a value as the 1TB Bolt.
pros: Very responsive, springy unit that’s easy to set up and use
cons: Half the recording capacity of the Bolt OTA
Subscription to TiVo is required to use DVR features
A bit buggy when using core streaming apps like Hulu or YouTube

customer_reviews.title: Bolt 500 does not work
customer_reviews.text: I am on my 3rd Bolt 500GB in 30 days. Each one has had the same issue. Code V301. One cannot get any apps. I spent hours with support only to come up with the same answer, it is a known issue and have been working on a fix since November. The suggestion they offer is to keep checking for the software update to occur. Don't waste your money on this unit until it is assured this issue has been fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Adam

customer_reviews.title: The Bolt is taking way to many naps!
customer_reviews.text: I had a Tivo box years ago and it was flawless. I like the idea of the Bolt with the ability to record OTA and streaming. I have had the Bolt for four days and the remote and the box keep going to sleep so I am unable to use the system. The remote and the box are not responding when I push the buttons. Resetting both devices is a very temporary fix. Customer support is nice, but not useful in resolving the technical issues. I was told this was a known issue but given no resolution. I hope they figure this out because I really like the concept. I hope to update with good news!
customer_reviews.author: Michael F. Heneghan

customer_reviews.title: Bigtime Drop of OTA Channel Signal Strength
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of typing the issues with this Bolt Vox 500gb I just purchased. So I deleted it all and will say...If you're coming from the Channel Master DVR+ (IDK about the Stream) then you are about to hate life... Run away... I amplified the signal strength but cant test after because I cant reboot now... I tried all reboot methods and all I get is the TiVo black screen of death... What a complete waste of a day!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: system worked for two weeks. TIVO has not been ...
customer_reviews.text: system worked for two weeks. TIVO has not been able to fix problems with unit. I have been waiting on repair for over a month.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A TiVo-RENEWED DVR
customer_reviews.text: Although I did not see any mention of it in the Amazon listing, this is a "TiVo Renewed" device, not a brand new device. If I had known, I probably would have bought it anyway because I've bought renewed TiVo DVRs before, but shame on Amazon for not making this clear. That aside, they got this to me very quickly when my old Roamio suddenly died, so overall I'm satisfied. Just be aware when you're ordering, but don't dismiss it because it's a refurb. TiVo generally does a good job on these.
customer_reviews.author: GeneK

customer_reviews.title: MISUNDERSTOOD
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if this bolt vox 500 is a 5 star or a 1 star because I was misled when deciding to buy it - I asked and received from the community, "yes" it works with Amazon fire stick - well, when I ran with that info and I was elated because I never before considered a recorder and missed a lot of shows - I didn't realize that "perhaps" my question should have been records with not works with. It didn't even come on after hubby and I connected it and after asking the specific question "will it record amazon video the seller was kind enough to answer--absolutely not, it won't record anything streaming--must return. :((
customer_reviews.author: ladyloni

customer_reviews.title: Glad we switched from our troublesome history of cable boxes
customer_reviews.text: Spectrum took over our cable system a year ago, and we like them for the most part. Their cable boxes, though, have all been rebuilt, not new. We had three different boxes last year, each with its own problems. We finally decided to spend the money and purchase this Tivo BOLT. Problem(s) solved. Our only issue, now, is the Tivo is smarter than we are. It's been a bit of a learning curve, but we are happy we made the switch.
customer_reviews.author: D. H. Leake

customer_reviews.title: Requires TiVo subscription for 3rd party streaming
customer_reviews.text: I've been a longtime TiVo customer and I'm disappointed by this product. The Bolt Vox supports both OTA DVR and Streaming. However, you are forced into purchasing an OTA subscription, even if you just want to use the streaming service. I totally understand paying TiVo a subscription for OTA. However, I think it's rather silly having to pay both TiVo and Netflix to watch streamed shows. Additionally, TiVo should offer some sort of "household" subscription model, for those with multiple OTA DVR devices, in one location. Cable companies have long offered this sort of billing option. TiVo charges you the full subscription, for each DVR, in a single household.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Buchholtz

customer_reviews.title: Error Restart the UI
customer_reviews.text: TiVo service needs to be activated. After going through the whole setup process I received and Error to restart the UI. Called TiVo support 877-367-8486 and she told me that I needed an activated service account. Previous TiVos I have purchased did not require this for setup. I had already paid for my yearly subscription on the TiVo I was replacing. The support person transferred my account to the new TiVo. We ran through the setup process again and everything worked. Additionally, she called me back 2 days later to make sure everything was working right.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: Love that voice remote
customer_reviews.text: I've owned TiVos almost from the beginning, and I've been happy with all of them. I bought this one to put in my guest room, for my 90 year old mother's visits. She follows a lot of TV shows and likes to skip commercials when she watches them. The voice control is just what she needs to cope with my TV service. (She lives with my sister, who has DirecTV and their DVR; I have Xfinity cable and TiVo) In fact, I bought a voice remote for the older Bolt in my living room and upgraded to the new interface after messing around with this one for awhile. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Joseph E. Demartino

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought this years ago
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect upgrade to a cable company DVR. I had a TIVO many years ago and liked it a lot, but haven't had one for probably 10 years. This was easy to install--just took the cable card out of the existing cable company DVR and plugged it in. It works flawlessly with Alexa and is going to let me retire the Logitech Harmony skill, which is very unreliable and drives me crazy. The voice-enabled remote works like a charm. I love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: AceG8tr

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Wanted one for years, Very load cooling fan. Have to subscribe to a monthly/yearly service which does not save you any money from leasing a box from your provider. Cheaper and easier to use a smart TV with Apps and stream everything you want to watch and when you want to watch it.
customer_reviews.author: Zonian

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have used an older TiVo for the last ten years, and purchased the new Bolt when my old one quit. I am constantly amazed at what the new version can do! No more the cumbersome typing with the remote... use the voice to search and find any program in just seconds! I am so pleased that I now have the new TiVo Bolt! I highly recommend this but great innovation!
customer_reviews.author: G. Michael Hughes

customer_reviews.title: What a rip off
customer_reviews.text: No one tells you that you have to pay $14.99 a month in addition to purchasing the tivo to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewing

customer_reviews.title: The vendor was great.
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to replace an older bolt. The new graphical interface is hard to get use to. the software locks up and you can no longer pick a recording folder to play, you can only watch one the manually start the next program. I have not had a chance to discuss these isuses with TiVo so I am hopping a software reload will help. The vendor was great.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Matteson

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed in this model. it died after 5 months, so the 90 day warranty is expired. There is a one year limited warranty on parts, but the labor to fix it would probably eat up most of the $150 purchase price. If you're thinking of buying a Bolt, I would strongly recommend the extended warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Heeg

customer_reviews.title: Glad To Get Rid Of Satellite
customer_reviews.text: I have only had Tivo Bolt Vox for a little over a week, but it seems to be doing a great job for what offers. I have yet to get my ota stations in clearly due to poor antenna. The live streaming is working great and the picture is actually clearer than the hd signal i was getting on my former satellite service. I do wish Tivo offered connection with Fire Stick and other streaming services so I could get it all on one device.
customer_reviews.author: R Brady

customer_reviews.title: My TiVo doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: My TiVo doesn't work. The TiVo won't load the program guide, and won't let me bypass the program guide, so my TV is useless until the TiVo is able to load a program guide. I called technical support, and I was told it would take a week for them to correct the problem. I've missed five days of my shows so far, but at least I'm getting caught up on my reading.
customer_reviews.author: Yalt Stonesmith

customer_reviews.title: Just get a DVR thru your cable company!
customer_reviews.text: Too much money, too much hassle, have to pay a monthly fee to TiVo & your cable company! Instead of all that trouble, I just returned it & got a DVR thru my cable company. You see, in order for the TiVo to work, you have to contact your cable company & rent a cable card... Ridiculous! Not at all worth the money or the trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy B.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Came with an issue, called TiVo 0 help. Still waiting for the call back. Returned
customer_reviews.author: rich s

customer_reviews.title: Limited Device with quirky Apps
customer_reviews.text: For the cost of this device and the additional monthly service fee it really lacks for expandability thru the use of apps. It has limited number of apps and they don't really have any of the latest ones like YouTube TV, Showtime Now, ESPN, or many of the other on demand apps from popular channels.
customer_reviews.author: BJarrell

customer_reviews.title: Unable to activate device
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to activate device online so I called TiVo is listed number. They suggested that the number printed on the back of the device is probably incorrect in your solution was to return the device to Amazon. What should've taken a few minutes to set up to take weeks to straighten out so no I am not satisfied with TiVo.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Oneil

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with Direct TV
customer_reviews.text: I need to return Direct TVis not compatible with TiVo I shouldn’t have to pay shipping. You should state the fact that certain companies do not recognize TiVo.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: APP DOES NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: YOU CAN NOT STREAM WITH THE APP FOR ANDROID, DOES NOT WORK HORRIBLE, HORRIBLE, HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.author: todd lasota

customer_reviews.title: All the convenience of cable without the excessive cost...
customer_reviews.text: We cut the cable cord a few months back--found that we have over 40 local tv channels off the air, but did miss the ability to record shows while we were out, and not having the "tv guide" function of cable and/or satellite. This works great, probably will need to order the companion unit for the other room, tho.
customer_reviews.author: Jax

customer_reviews.title: TiVo bolt  --  Not as good as older units !
customer_reviews.text: I have had 3 other TiVo units that work great , not this one . Control options are not as good as my Romeo . It is just a bed room unit occasional use is ok , not for every day use .... Or I would have returned it ...
customer_reviews.author: Chuck & Patricia

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY IF USING WITH CABLE CARD.
customer_reviews.text: After 3 replacement Tivo boxes and and 12 cable cards both comcast and tivo gave up. They could never get the cable card to validate. Comcast blamed Tivo and vise versa. Do not buy this is you plan to use with comcast. Tivo support is subpar as well. Overseas support and very poor technical skills. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: not as good
customer_reviews.text: just quits for no reason, tech support very bad, old one I retired worked much better, very disappointed with this!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Card

customer_reviews.title: The recording feature is great. Unable to watch Hulu or YouTube
customer_reviews.text: The recording feature is great. Unable to watch Hulu or YouTube it freezes , cannot stream out of Home on iPad tech-support was useless. TiVo sent me a New box same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Liam

customer_reviews.title: Tivo sux
customer_reviews.text: Tivo sucks they put there tivo+ channels on every page of the guide unless you're a fan of America's funniest home videos or unsolved mysteries from the 80s dont buy a tivo
customer_reviews.author: Kris Joanna Gaskill

customer_reviews.title: It’s faster than my old TiVo premier
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace my old TiVo premier. I love it. The controls and loading are much faster. It wasn’t hard to install. What actually took the longest was getting Comcast to activate this properly.
customer_reviews.author: Davensj

customer_reviews.title: Cut the Cord
customer_reviews.text: I should have done this years ago. I still have cable and with the Tivo subscription I'm not really saving anything, but it's nice to know I'm not tied to a cable company. Very responsive and online guide is better than the one with the cable company. I'm taking it to AZ this week and see how the OTA reception is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tivo v1.0, then DirecTV, then Spectrum, now back to Tivo + cable.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, when it first was released, and today in 2019. Works perfectly. If you have cable, ditch the cable DVR, and get this box. I especially like watching basketball games when traveling. Quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Ed R.

customer_reviews.title: Replaced Comcast DVR
customer_reviews.text: With my own Tivo - love the "D" button to jump past commercials (particularly in election season). Smaller, easy to install. Learning curve still figuring out how to so stuff, but I watch about 2 hrs per week.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Tivo Bolt
customer_reviews.text: I've had both the bolt and mini for about 2 months. Still figuring out all the features. So far working fine. Plenty of storage
customer_reviews.author: M. R. Colella

customer_reviews.title: It is as good or better than advertised!
customer_reviews.text: It is as good or better than advertised. I wish I knew about this sooner. My only complaint is I purchased this in mid November and It went on sale after Thanksgiving, I could have saved $20 or more. I hope the Mini Vox price comes down, I don't see why they cost almost as much as the Main Bolt DVR unit.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry McAlister

customer_reviews.title: Works great..
customer_reviews.text: Works great... Much better software interface than my previous Tivo Premiere. Didn't realize how many changes had been done since then. Much faster on Apps like "Netflix" and "Amazon prime". Really worth the upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: R. D. Little

customer_reviews.title: did not work
customer_reviews.text: The product was defective. Had to return it. Bought a new one for an additional $20 from Best Buy which works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: Tivo makes it easy to escape television's schedule & advertising
customer_reviews.text: Tivo makes it easy to escape television's schedule & advertising. That's plenty. It's easy to operate, even taking verbal commands for many functions. We do have a minor technical problem but we do expect to resolve it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Foley

customer_reviews.title: Fire the genius that decided I needed a new user experience.
customer_reviews.text: This product spontaneously reboots way too often. It seems to want to record all sorts of shows I don't want, filling the SSD so that shows I do want to see get deleted earlier than I am used to with my old TiVi (this is just a default "feature" of the new UI as far as I can tell and I've stopped it after losing some content).
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Lost Cause
customer_reviews.text: Never got it to work. Tivo blamed my cable company. My cable company blamed Tivo. After two boxes and way too many lost hours, I gave up.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: A massive improvement over previous TiVo boxes. Works seamlessly with streaming services, and the skip function is a lifesaver for live recordings.
customer_reviews.author: Chris O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: My wife and I have been using this DVR for ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have been using this DVR for about a month and are really impressed how well it integrates all that is available to just one remote. The 15 dollar a month required service is expensive but to us seems worth the money .
customer_reviews.author: KEVIN McCAWLEY

customer_reviews.title: 3 months + 10 days unit stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the unit stopped working after three months. Turned on the TV one morning and there was a black screen. If I reset the unit, the TV recognize it, so the input, cables are working , I can see the Tivo logo loading, the starting up screen loading but that's it after that all I see is a black screen.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos B

customer_reviews.title: Crap box, SUPER crap customer service...
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this for 92 days and it quit working. Their customer service is a JOKE.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Good product for me.
customer_reviews.text: The TiVo unit allowed me to add many advanced features to my moms basic cable service. The ability to record 4 programs at the same time. To pause live tv. To skip some comerciales with 1 button push on some recorded shows. To be able to stream shows from amazon prime or Netflix or others. Lastly, a usable program guide
customer_reviews.author: Bruce V

customer_reviews.title: I love the new interface after I got used to it
customer_reviews.text: I'm a long time Tivo user, and this is a bit more complicated. I love the new interface after I got used to it.
customer_reviews.author: James E. Ginch Jr.

customer_reviews.title: use chrome to setup
customer_reviews.text: works great, though account signup is not such an easy set of screens to navigate on safari
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: i like
customer_reviews.text: the greatest thing since sliced bread. two words, commercial skip.
customer_reviews.author: Harleyhunt

customer_reviews.title: Missing piece
customer_reviews.text: The bottom card cover is missing.. it was suppose to bring the bottom card cover.. is it possible that this piece can be shipped to my address? Because it did not come with the bottom card cover of the Tivo box
customer_reviews.author: Leandro

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This TiVo box is one of the best. I have had TiVo for 16 years , and I find that this is the best box that has come out thus far.
customer_reviews.author: mrrlr98

customer_reviews.title: Been a TIVO addict for many years and although this ...
customer_reviews.text: Been a TIVO addict for many years and although this new incarnation has some new things to get used to, I am still loving the TIVO experience!!
customer_reviews.author: JBrown

customer_reviews.title: This was a refurbished unit that died after 2 months of operation
customer_reviews.text: The HDMI ports are weak and they tend to go out frequently and are not repairable.
customer_reviews.author: Justin M.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The hdmi port is a bad connection. I keep losing the signal to my tv.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis P. Schnobrich

customer_reviews.title: It is making a terrible high pitched noise when operating
customer_reviews.text: It is making a terrible high pitched noise when operating. Can't figure out how to contact customer service to return. Please seller, contact me!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie O. Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: I love everything about my TiVo (except the monthly subscription)
customer_reviews.text: I love my TiVo. The only thing I did not like is you have to buy a monthly subscription to use it. Other than that it does what is suppose to do (record your program shows) and has lots of cool apps.
customer_reviews.author: Kondi

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t work out for us but they honored a return
customer_reviews.author: jill d

customer_reviews.title: It is serving the purpose
customer_reviews.text: I am using this product to get some programs from the air.. I have not tried the voice recognition yet
customer_reviews.author: Yoyo

customer_reviews.title: Why aren’t stars sufficient I have no interest in typing a review
customer_reviews.text: Why aren’t stars sufficient I have no interest in typing a review
customer_reviews.author: c. dean

customer_reviews.title: Great picture smooth operation
customer_reviews.text: Call tivo to set it up after you give the cable card info to your cable provider.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Get One
customer_reviews.text: Great item!! Easy to set up and use. Worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn A. Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Good value and a great product
customer_reviews.text: System is easy to use both with the main unit and the remote minis in a network. Setup was straight forward and had no problems. The skip feature is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: David Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to cutting cord
customer_reviews.text: Great alternative to cutting cord, Tivo leverages existing cable or fios and has a lot of features for tv or streaming. fast as well
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: TiVo is AMAZING, it gives you the guide and allows you ...
customer_reviews.text: We got rid of cable and instead got a digital antenna and TiVo. TiVo is AMAZING, it gives you the guide and allows you to record.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal G

customer_reviews.title: Just the thing for cord cutters
customer_reviews.text: Just the thing for cord cutters. Fast, responsive and an intuitive remote make this one item the only one that you'll need.
customer_reviews.author: J. Siple

customer_reviews.title: work's great
customer_reviews.text: This DVR it's all what, is been claim to be work super, thank will recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Don Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Replace cable leases DVRs
customer_reviews.text: Great way to cut out monthly charges on the cable bill.
customer_reviews.author: KEVIN

customer_reviews.title: Apps wouldnt load onto box
customer_reviews.text: Aside from having to wait a week to use it because the apps wouldnt load until i contacted them....., all has been well
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hicks

customer_reviews.title: not sure if it will read a cable card in my location because my cable company wants me to lease their enjoyment at a premium
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this item without the protection plan. This is my second bolt. The first one would not read a cable card, which I didn't find out until I had it for about 9 months (when I ordered cable... Originally I used it for streaming only). Also, not sure if it will read a cable card in my location because my cable company wants me to lease their enjoyment at a premium. Good luck. Love the way this works with the minis. Mica connection our Ethernet. I wouldn't go wireless
customer_reviews.author: Lions in the Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great produit
customer_reviews.text: The easiness of navigation. The TIVO is much better than cable DVR.
customer_reviews.author: NECKER D.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. But still need monthly fee for full use of options on Tivo bolt
customer_reviews.author: R. Yoza

customer_reviews.title: Great tuner and recorder, not a great user interface
customer_reviews.text: I guess I'm an old fuddy-duddy, but I really liked the old TiVo interface. The new screens mimic the layout that DirecTV and some of the cable boxes use, but it doesn't make it simple to view stored DVR content that the box has. I *am* thrilled with how powerful the over-the-air tuner is - that's how I use this box, to record the over-the-air stations, and it does a great job. The RF remotes are nice (no more pointing at the TiVo box) and the box is reasonably responsive (not slow). I guess my only real complaint is that I don't like the new user interface.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Verbil

customer_reviews.title: I love TiVo BUT..
customer_reviews.text: I read this is STILL not compatible with At&t uverse. I ordered one then learned of this and didn’t even open it - just shippe it back. So dissatisfied they have written the software to integrate At&t
customer_reviews.author: JamesF22

customer_reviews.title: This would have been nice to know
customer_reviews.text: Just received the Bolt. My wife started to set it up and noted it is not compatible with direct TV. This would have been nice to know.
customer_reviews.author: Sgsb

product_meta.title: TiVo BOLT VOX 500 GB, DVR & Streaming Media Player, 4K UHD, Now with Voice Control (TCD849500V),Black
product_meta.description: TiVo’s innovative Unified Entertainment System now includes the ultimate voice remote that dramatically improves the search experience across all your live TV, DVR and streaming TV series and movies. The 4K Ultra HD compatible TiVo BOLT VOX still boasts TiVo’s unique fan-favorite features including SkipMode™, OnePass™, OneSearch™ and more. And with three different models, there’s a BOLT VOX specifically crafted to meet your entertainment demands and budget. Home Networking - WiFi 802.11ac 4x4 DBS. Power- 12V.
feature_bullets: TiVo?s new Voice Remote lets you instantly search across your live TV, DVR recordings and streaming content to quickly and easily find what you?re looking for.
This unified entertainment system replaces your cable box and works with your existing cable subscription (requires Cable Card).Not supported - Satellite, AT&T U-verse, 3 TB Unit: OTA not supported
Your favorite streaming apps are fully Integrated: no more switching inputs, remotes or devices. Access Netflix, Prime, HBO go, Hulu, Pandora and more from one, integrated experience.
Fully 4K/Ultra High-Definition compatible right out of the box, so you can soak up all that crisp color, clarity and detail.
TiVo service subscription is required. Options include a monthly service plan at $14.99/mo. and a 1-Year commitment, and an Annual service plan at $149.99/year.
Record 4 shows at once and up to 75 hours of HD.
NOTE: Refer the User Manual before use.

specifications.Special Features: Over The Air Tuner, Digital Cable
specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars177 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
